entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:01PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Along The Tanana River Into Next Weekend... High water continues along glacially fed rivers draining the Alaska Range, including the Delta, Nenana and Tanana Rivers. Warm temperatures continue to cause enhanced glacial and high elevation snowmelt runoff. Low lying areas along these rivers may fill with water. Increased river bank erosion will occur.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley
